Utils

Class HttpResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • Utils.HttpResponse

  • public class HttpResponse
extends java.lang.Object
    From Wikipedia: "The response message consists of the following: -A Status-Line (for example HTTP/1.1 200 OK, which indicates that the client's request succeeded) -Response Headers, such as Content-Type: text/html -An empty line -An optional message body" By all means not a complete definition of all possible responses.
    Author:
    wiselion

      • HttpResponse

        public HttpResponse(java.io.InputStream in)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Will read till steam closes or content length reached. So dont go and give me an endless stream. Throws error if tag doesnt match.

        java.io.IOException
